attributes.additional_details:
Train travel is becoming an important part of travel, both for work, education and leisure.

Train travel has been big talk and discussion so far, both for government and commuters.

Train travel reduced by 5% or 7% would make it so much easier and affordable, but the government are always using the excuses of saying that improvements will happen - THEY NEVER DO, FORGET IT! Even many people agree, and see no improvements at all! Train costs are always rising, and people are becoming hacked off with the cost of travelling via rail!

We ask the Department of Transport, along the Government, to consider this as making sense, and not ignore it.

rejection.details: What action are you calling on the Government to take?  Restrict the number of tickets sold?
